src:
L’école primaire de Saint-Benjamin sera encore fermée mardi
04 Nov 2019 by Olivier Turcotte



Crédit photo : Archives


L’école la Tourterelle, de Saint-Benjamin, restera fermée le mardi 5 novembre, suite à un dégât d’eau survenu en fin de semaine dernière.
La Commission scolaire de la Beauce-Etchemin a fait savoir qu’une décision sera prise demain (mardi) quant à son ouverture mercredi.
text:
The primary school of Saint-Benjamin will be closed Tuesday
04 Nov 2019 by Olivier Turcotte



Photo credit: Archives


La Tourterelle school, in Saint-Benjamin, will remain closed on Tuesday, November 5th, following a water damage that occurred at the end of last week.
The Beauce-Etchemin School Board has announced that a decision will be made tomorrow (Tuesday) as to its opening on Wednesday.
